GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.30 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
ocfs2: fix memory leak in ocfs2_mount_volume()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 2b7e59ed2e77136e9360274f8f0fc208a003e95c, it was introduced in version v2.6.30 by commit 9140db04ef185f934acf2b1b15b3dd5e6a6bfc22. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ocfs2: fix memory leak in ocfs2_mount_volume()
OSV.details:
